results.question: Which approach is best for Scrum Team in order to produce valuable Increments?
results.correct_answer: Each Scrum Team is accountable for developing functionality from beginning to end.
incorrect_answers: Each Scrum Team works on an independent set of components.
Each Scrum Team Member work only as an independent layer of the system.
Each Developer works on the component where they feel that they can contribute.

results.question: When is the Sprint Backlog created?
Why is it important that there is only one Product Owner per product?
correct_answer: It helps avoid barriers to effective communication and rapid decision-making.
Scrum Team always knows who determines the order of the Product.
It is clear who is accountable for the ultimate value of the product.
incorrect_answers: The Scrum Master knows who acts as their backup while on vacation.
It would confuse the stakeholders if they had to work with more than one person.
